alert.note: Alert for Blanco; Gillespie; Llano (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 3:55PM CDT until May 05 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Blanco County in south central Texas... Northeastern Gillespie County in south central Texas... Southern Llano County in south central Texas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 355 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Enchanted Rock State Natural Area, or 17 miles southwest of Llano, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Round Mountain, Horseshoe Bay, Blowout, Enchanted Rock State Natural Area, Eckert, Sandy, Crabapple, Willow City and Oxford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for south central Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
